text: In this article, we'll explore how to set up a NestJS project for microservices using a mono-repo structure.
Discover how to organize your NestJS project into three essential services,
Order Producer, Order Persistence, and Order Notification.
These services interact with Amazon SQS, utilize DynamoDB for storage, and send notifications via Amazon SES.
The guide also covers creating shared libraries, updating configurations, and setting up scripts for efficient building and running.
If you're interested, delve into the full setup guide below.
